title: [MINDSET] Ep. 28: How to Have More Fun While You’re Achieving w/ Jason Goldberg
description:
On this week’s episode, Ashley and award-winning entrepreneur, author, TEDx speaker, and former rapper, Jason Goldberg tackle the complex balance of having fun while achieving your dreams. In this fun and deep-diving interview, Ashley and Jason discuss how to be high-performing and highly productive without accruing stress and anxiety, how to take the seriousness out of being successful, and how to change your perspective from good vs bad to less effective vs more effective. You will learn how to use the thoughts that are serving you and challenge the thoughts that hinder your progress by taking radical personal responsibility, and ultimately be able to answer the question: how do I intend to use my life today?

Check out Jason’s Websites:

Thejasongoldberg.com

Playfulprosperity.com

Jason's Book: Prison Break: Vanquish the Victim, Own Your Obstacles, and Lead Your Life
